author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> I saw that there is a 4844 implementers’ call scheduled for next week. are they supposed to replace the breakout rooms? afact we didn’t schedule another one of those

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> (i.e. would that also be the right place to talk about the specs?)

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> I would say so, yes. We’ll have them weekly, though, so I’d expect regular attendance to generally be lower than the breakouts where we bundles all the stuff that had been pending for a while? Spec issues are very much welcome, though!

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> The goal with the call though is to make sure things are progressing well on all fronts, so I expect they will be more “granular” than the breakouts
